member.name: T:CogitoSharp.Channel
member.summary: Channel class, for both public and private channels

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.Channel.Count
member.summary: Channel ID Number

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.Channel.name
member.summary: Channel name, in human-readable format

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.Channel.Userlist
member.summary: Array of all Users in the channel

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.Channel.chanTab
member.summary: Associated TabPage for this channel

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.Channel.minAge
member.summary: Minimum age to be in this channel. If set to a value greater than 0, the bot will attempt to kick everyone below this age.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Channel.Dispose
member.summary: Implementation of IDispose - removes tab page and disposes of Log to ensure buffer is flushed

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Channel.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor, used with Public (e.g. name-only) channels
member.param: The channel's name

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Channel.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for private channel, used on Invite or after ORS
member.param: The channel's UUID, used to join it
The channel's name

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Channel.Finalize
member.summary: Generic destrutor, closes associated TabPage

member.name: P:CogitoSharp.Channel.key
member.summary: Keys are the UUID for private channels; channel title for normal. Always use .key for channel-specific commands.

member.name: T:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor
member.summary: Contains all methods that process FList server/client commands

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.ACB(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires chat op or higher. Request a character's account be banned from the server. Send As: ACB { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.ADL(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Sends the client the current list of chatops. Received: ADL { "ops": [string] }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.AOP(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.AWC(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires chat op or higher. Requests a list of currently connected alts for a characters account. Send As: AWC { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.BRO(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CBL(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires channel op or higher. Request the channel banlist. Send As: CBL { "channel": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CBU(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CCR(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Create a private, invite-only channel. Send As: CCR { "channel": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CDS(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CHA(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CIU(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CKU(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.COA(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.COL(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CON(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: After connecting and identifying you will receive a CON command, giving the number of connected users to the network. Received: CON { "count": int }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.COR(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CRC(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command is admin only. Creates an official channel. Send As: CRC { "channel": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CSO(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CTU(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.CUB(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires channel op or higher. Unbans a user from a channel. Send As: CUB { channel: "channel", character: "character" }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.DOP(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.ERR(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Indicates that the given error has occurred. Received: ERR {"message": "string", "number": int}

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.FKS(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.FLN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Sent by the server to inform the client a given character went offline. Received: FLN { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.FRL(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Initial friends list. Received: FRL { "characters": [string] }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.HLO(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Server hello command. Tells which server version is running and who wrote it. Received: HLO { "message": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.ICH(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.IGN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: A multi-faceted command to handle actions related to the ignore list. The server does not actually handle much of the ignore process, as it is the client's responsibility to block out messages it recieves from the server if that character is on the user's ignore list. Received: IGN { "action": string, "characters": [string] | "character":object } TODO: ???

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.JCH(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.KID(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Kinks data in response to a KIN client command. Received: KID { "type": enum, "message": string, "key": [int], "value": [int] }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.KIK(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires chat op or higher. Request a character be kicked from the server. Send As: KIK { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.KIN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Request a list of a user's kinks. Send As: KIN { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.LCH(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.LIS(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Sends an array of *all* the online characters and their gender, status, and status message. Received: LIS { characters: [object] }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.LRP(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: A roleplay ad is received from a user in a channel. Received: LRP { "channel": "", "message": "", "character": ""}

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.MSG(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.NLN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: A user connected. Received: NLN { "identity": string, "gender": enum, "status": enum }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.ORS(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Gives a list of open private rooms. Received: ORS { "channels": [object] } e.g. "channels": [{"name":"ADH-300f8f419e0c4814c6a8","characters":0,"title":"Ariel's Fun Club"}] etc. etc. Send As: ORS

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.PIN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Ping command from the server, requiring a response, to keep the connection alive. Received: PIN Send As: PIN

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.PRD(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Profile data commands sent in response to a PRO client command. Received: PRD { "type": enum, "message": string, "key": string, "value": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.PRI(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.PRO(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Requests some of the profile tags on a character, such as Top/Bottom position and Language Preference. Send As: PRO { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.RLD(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires chat op or higher. Reload certain server config files Send As: RLD { "save": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.RLL(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Roll dice or spin the bottle. Send As: RLL { "channel": string, "dice": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.RMO(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.RST(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires channel op or higher. Sets a private room's status to closed or open. Send As: RST { "channel": string, "status": enum }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.RTB(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Real-time bridge. Indicates the user received a note or message, right at the very moment this is received. Received: RTB { "type": string, "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.RWD(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command is admin only. Rewards a user, setting their status to 'crown' until they change it or log out. Send As: RWD { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.STA(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.SYS(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: An informative autogenerated message from the server. Received: SYS { "message": string, "channel": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.TMO(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires chat op or higher. Times out a user for a given amount minutes. Send As: TMO { "character": string, "time": int, "reason": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.TPN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.UBN(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: This command requires chat op or higher. Unbans a character's account from the server. Send As: UBN { "character": string }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.UPT(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Informs the client of the server's self-tracked online time, and a few other bits of information Received: UPT { "time": int, "starttime": int, "startstring": string, "accepted": int, "channels": int, "users": int, "maxusers": int }

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.FListProcessor.VAR(CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand)
member.summary: Variables the server sends to inform the client about server variables.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand.send
member.summary: Sends the message by adding it to the OutgoingMessageQueue

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.IO.SystemCommand.ToServerString
member.summary: Produces a string that fserv can interpret.

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.IO.Message.chat_max
member.summary: Maximum length (in bytes) of a channel message; longer and you gotta split it

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.IO.Message.priv_max
member.summary: Maximum length (in bytes) of a private message.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.IO.Message.send
member.summary: Sends the message by adding it to the OutgoingMessageQueue

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.IO.Message.reply(System.String)
member.summary: Replies to the message by posting to the same user/channel where the Message originated
member.param: Text to reply with.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.IO.Logging.LogFile.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates a FileStream for writing to the logfile, and periodically (default: 10 sec.) flushes the buffer to preserve that data in event of failure. Keeping the file open rathern than open -> append -> close aparently improves performance
member.param: The Filename of the file to be logged to. Folder is automatically added.
The folder below the root logging folder, if any, this log should be put into. Default is none.
The interval, in milliseconds, between calling Flush().
The file extension for the log, default ".txt".

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.Name
member.summary: xXxSEPHIROTHxXx

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.Weight
member.summary: You're fat.

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.Orientation
member.summary: Sexual orientation; can't be made an enum due to hyphens not working and that fucking up parsing, iirc

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.Stats
member.summary: Since currently I'd have to implement custom parsing code for all of this, instead I just stick it into a dict. Eye color, dick size, everything is in here. Probably.

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.Kinks
member.summary: Here's where things get WEIRD.

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.isInteresting
member.summary: Filtering ideas blatantly stolen from slimCat; sorry, Andrew.

member.name: F:CogitoSharp.User.dataTakenOn
member.summary: Stores the DateTime on which the profile was last scraped, allowing the program to self-update every... what, week?

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.User.GetAvatar
member.summary: Retriedves the users's avatar (100 * 100 px Bitmap image) from F-Lists' server, and saves it. If it's less than a week old, it won't bother fetching it.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.User.GetProfileInfo
member.summary: Connects to F-List and grabs all of the user's delicious information. Data is serialized when program shuts down to cut down on API connections / web scraping bandwith

member.name: P:CogitoSharp.User.Age
member.summary: 2 shota 4 u

member.name: T:CogitoSharp.Utils.Math
member.summary: Mathematical utility functions

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Utils.Math.dampenedSpringDelta(System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a float[] filled with values for a 'dampened spring' animation.
member.param: Integer at which to start; x-position. Default: 0 (can be used for addition to start position)
Amplitude of the spring, default 1f. Max value which it can reach.
Level of damping, default 0.2f
Tension of the spring, default 0.7f
Number of data points to generate; the higher the number, the smoother the curve. Default: 50
member.returns: A float[] with values describing the oscillation of the dampened spring.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Utils.Math.numberToSentence``1(``0@)
member.summary: Transforms a number into its spoken representation, e.g. 123.45 to "one hundred and twenty three point fourty five"
member.param: The number
member.returns: A string with the number in spoken form.

member.name: M:CogitoSharp.Utils.Math.RandomChoice``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Returns a random element from the IEnumerable T
member.typeparam: The type of collection from which to get the item. Must implement IEnumerable
member.param: The collection from which to randomly choose an item
member.returns: A random item from object source
